name: Attackers from the Bahamas
description:
You are a lost traveler who was trying to get to the Bahamas, but ended up in outer space. There are now hoards of aliens that for some reason want to tear you to shreds. So the only logical thing to do was to buy a space craft to tear them to shreds. Have fun!!!

This is my first 2D game I've created so I hope its not too bad. Ill be updating it every once in a while to add new enemy's and a boss.
